languages.text: Иногда вашему персонажу придется принимать непростые решения, исходя из его ценностей, интересов и целей. Подобные решения влияют на его убеждения, которые развиваются в трех направлениях: Догматик, Схизматик и Еретик. Каждое из направлений включает пять рангов — чем выше ранг, тем более рьяно персонаж следует своим убеждениям, и тем заметнее мир вокруг реагирует на его поступки и решения. Продвижение по рангам каждого из трех направлений открывает доступ к новым репликам в диалогах и уникальным способностям, а также меняет отношение окружающих к вашему персонажу. Кроме того, некоторые предметы можно экипировать персонажам только с определенными убеждениями. Когда одно из убеждений достигает ранга III поборник, оно становится основным направлением для развития персонажа. После этого оставшиеся два типа убеждений не могут подняться выше ранга II сторонник. Собственные убеждения есть не только у вашего персонажа, но и у его союзников.
languages.original_text: Sometimes your character will have to make tough decisions based on their values, interests, and goals. Such decisions affect their сonvictions that can develop in three directions: Imperialis, Benevolentia, Hereticus. Each includes five ranks — the higher the rank, the more zealously the character follows their convictions, and the more noticeably the world around them reacts to their actions and decisions. Promotion through the ranks of each of the three directions opens up access to new dialogue lines, events, unique abilities, and also changes the attitude of others toward your character.

traits.locale_text:
Иногда вашему персонажу придется принимать непростые решения, исходя из его ценностей, интересов и целей. Подобные решения влияют на его убеждения и развивают их в трех направлениях: Империум, Благодеяние и Скверна. Каждое из направлений включает пять рангов — чем выше ранг, тем более рьяно персонаж следует своим убеждениям, и тем заметнее мир вокруг реагирует на его поступки и решения.
Продвижение по рангам каждого из трех направлений открывает доступ к новым репликам в диалогах, событиям, уникальным способностям, а также меняет отношение окружающих к вашему персонажу.

Иногда вашему персонажу придется принимать непростые решения, исходя из его ценностей, интересов и целей. Подобные решения влияют на его убеждения и развивают их в трех направлениях: Империум, Благодеяние и Скверна. Каждое из направлений включает пять рангов — чем выше ранг, тем более рьяно персонаж следует своим убеждениям, и тем заметнее мир вокруг реагирует на его поступки и решения.
Продвижение по рангам каждого из трех направлений открывает доступ к новым репликам в диалогах, событиям, уникальным способностям, а также меняет отношение окружающих к вашему персонажу.

languages.text: Sometimes your character will have to make tough decisions based on their values, interests, and goals. Such decisions affect their convictions. This can develop in three directions: Dogmatic, Iconoclast, Heretical. Each includes five ranks — the higher the rank, the more zealously the character follows their convictions, and the more noticeably the world around them reacts to their actions and decisions. Promotion through the ranks of each of the three directions opens up access to new dialogue lines, events, unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and also changes the attitude of others toward your character. Also, some items can only be equipped by characters with certain convictions. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent. Your character's allies have convictions of their own, as well.

This can develop in three directions: Dogmatic, Iconoclast, Heretical. Each includes five ranks — the higher the rank, the more zealously the character follows their convictions, and the more noticeably the world around them reacts to their actions and decisions. Promotion through the ranks of each of the three directions opens up access to new dialogue lines, events, unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and also changes the attitude of others toward your character. Also, some items can only be equipped by characters with certain convictions. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent. Your character's allies have convictions of their own, as well.

Promotion through the ranks of each of the three directions opens up access to new dialogue lines, events, unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and also changes the attitude of others toward your character. Sometimes your character will have to make tough decisions based on their values, interests, and goals. Such decisions affect their convictions. This can develop in three directions: Dogmatic, Iconoclast, Heretical. Each includes five ranks — the higher the rank, the more zealously the character follows their convictions, and the more noticeably the world around them reacts to their actions and decisions. Promotion through the ranks of each of the three directions opens up access to new dialogue lines, events, unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and also changes the attitude of others toward your character. Also, some items can only be equipped by characters with certain convictions. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent. Your character's allies have convictions of their own, as well.

languages.text: A veces tu personaje tendrá que tomar decisiones difíciles de acuerdo con sus valores, intereses y objetivos. Estas decisiones afectan a sus convicciones. Pueden progresar por tres caminos: dogmático, iconoclasta y hereje. Cada una de ellas cuenta con cinco rangos. Cuanto más alto sea, más ferviente es la creencia en ellas y más clara es la reacción del mundo que le rodea a sus actos y decisiones. El progreso entre los rangos de cada camino te permite acceder a nuevas líneas de diálogo, eventos y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} únicas y además cambia la actitud de los demás hacia tu personaje. Y no solo eso: algunos objetos solo se pueden equipar con una convicción concreta. Cuando una de las convicciones llega al rango III, devoto, se convierte en el foco principal de tu personaje. Cuando eso ocurre, las otras dos ramas de convicciones no pueden progresar más allá del rango II, partidario. Los aliados de tu personaje también cuentan con sus propias convicciones.
languages.original_text: Sometimes your character will have to make tough decisions based on their values, interests, and goals. Such decisions affect their convictions. This can develop in three directions: Dogmatic, Iconoclast, Heretical. Each includes five ranks — the higher the rank, the more zealously the character follows their convictions, and the more noticeably the world around them reacts to their actions and decisions. Promotion through the ranks of each of the three directions opens up access to new dialogue lines, events, unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and also changes the attitude of others toward your character. Also, some items can only be equipped by characters with certain convictions. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent. Your character's allies have convictions of their own, as well.

traits.locale_text: A veces tu personaje tendrá que tomar decisiones difíciles de acuerdo con sus valores, intereses y objetivos. Estas decisiones afectan a sus convicciones. Se puede desarrollar en tres vertientes: Imperialis, Benevolentia o Hereticus. Cada una de ellas cuenta con cinco rangos. Cuanto más alto sea, más ferviente es la creencia en ellas y más clara es la reacción del mundo que le rodea a sus actos y decisiones. El ascenso por los rangos de estas convicciones proporciona acceso a nuevas líneas de diálogo, eventos y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} únicas y además cambia la actitud de los demás hacia tu personaje.

languages.text: 価値観や興味、目標に基づいて、キャラクターが厳しい決断を迫られることもある。こういった決断はキャラクターの信念に影響を与えて、教条主義、革新主義、異端という3つの方向に育つ可能性がある。それぞれ5つのランクがあり、ランクが高いほど、そのキャラクターは自分の信念に熱心に従い、周囲がその行動や決断に目に見えて反応するようになる。 3つの方向の各ランクが上がっていくと、新たなセリフやイベント、独自の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が解放されて、あなたのキャラクターに対する他のキャラクターの態度も変化する。また、一部のアイテムは特定の信念を持ったキャラクターだけが装備可能だ。 信念の分岐のひとつがランク3の信奉者になると、それがキャラクターの主軸になる。そうなったら、他の2つの分岐信念はランク2の門下生より上になることはない。 あなたのキャラクターの仲間たちも同じくそれぞれの信念を持っている。
languages.original_text: Sometimes your character will have to make tough decisions based on their values, interests, and goals. Such decisions affect their convictions. This can develop in three directions: Dogmatic, Iconoclast, Heretical. Each includes five ranks — the higher the rank, the more zealously the character follows their convictions, and the more noticeably the world around them reacts to their actions and decisions. Promotion through the ranks of each of the three directions opens up access to new dialogue lines, events, unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and also changes the attitude of others toward your character. Also, some items can only be equipped by characters with certain convictions. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent. Your character's allies have convictions of their own, as well.

traits.locale_text: 価値観や興味、目標に基づいて、キャラクターが厳しい決断を迫られることもある。このような決定は信念に影響を及ぼす。これは帝国、ベネボレンティア、異端者の3つの方向に発展する可能性がある。それぞれ5つのランクがあり、ランクが高いほど、そのキャラクターは自分の信念に熱心に従い、周囲がその行動や決断に顕著に反応するようになる。 3方向それぞれのランクを昇格することで、新たなセリフやイベント、ユニークな{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を利用できるようになり、また、あなたのキャラクターに対する周囲の態度も変化する。

languages.text: 有的时候，您需要根据您自己的价值、兴趣与目标做出艰难的决定，这些决定会影响角色的信念。信念一共分为三个方向：教条主义、自由主义、异端主义。每个方向都有五个等级。等级越高，角色就越热衷于追随自己的信念，周围世界对角色的行为反应也会越明显。 晋升信念等级可以解锁新的新的对话台词、事件与独特的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，还能改变他人对角色的态度。除此之外，游戏中的部分物品只能由拥有特定信念的角色装备。 当角色的某项信念到达第三级：信奉者时，该信念便会成为该角色的主要信念。当人物拥有主要信念之后，其余两条信念分支最多便只能提升至第二级：拥护者，无法继续提升。 此外，您的盟友也同样拥有各自的信念。
languages.original_text: Sometimes your character will have to make tough decisions based on their values, interests, and goals. Such decisions affect their convictions. This can develop in three directions: Dogmatic, Iconoclast, Heretical. Each includes five ranks — the higher the rank, the more zealously the character follows their convictions, and the more noticeably the world around them reacts to their actions and decisions. Promotion through the ranks of each of the three directions opens up access to new dialogue lines, events, unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and also changes the attitude of others toward your character. Also, some items can only be equipped by characters with certain convictions. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent. Your character's allies have convictions of their own, as well.

traits.locale_text: 有的时候，您需要根据您自己的价值、兴趣与目标做出艰难的决定，这些决定会影响角色的信念。信念一共分为三个方向：教条主义、自由主义、异端主义。每个方向都有五个等级。等级越高，角色就越热衷于追随自己的信念，周围世界对角色的行为反应也会越明显。 晋升信念等级可以解锁新的新的对话台词、事件与独特的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，还能改变他人对角色的态度。除此之外，游戏中的部分物品只能由拥有特定信念的角色装备。 当角色的某项信念到达第三级：信奉者时，该信念便会成为该角色的主要信念。当人物拥有主要信念之后，其余两条信念分支最多便只能提升至第二级：拥护者，无法继续提升。 此外，您的盟友也同样拥有各自的信念。

languages.text: Manchmal muss dein Charakter schwierige Entscheidungen treffen, die auf seinen Werten, Interessen und Zielen basieren. Solche Entscheidungen beeinflussen die Überzeugungen. Dies kann sich in drei Richtungen entwickeln: Dogmatiker, Ikonoklast, Ketzer. Jede umfasst fünf Ränge – je höher der Rang, desto eifriger folgt der Charakter seinen Überzeugungen und desto deutlicher reagiert die Welt um ihn herum auf seine Handlungen und Entscheidungen. Die Beförderung durch die Ränge jeder der drei Richtungen eröffnet den Zugang zu neuen Dialogoptionen, Ereignissen, einzigartigen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und verändert auch die Haltung der anderen gegenüber deinem Charakter. Außerdem können einige Gegenstände nur von Charakteren mit bestimmten Überzeugungen ausgerüstet werden. Wenn einer der Überzeugungszweige Rang III: Geweihter erreicht, wird er zum Hauptfokus des Charakters. Wenn das passiert, können die anderen beiden Überzeugungszweige nicht mehr über Rang II: Anhänger steigen. Die Verbündeten deines Charakters haben auch eigene Überzeugungen.
languages.original_text: Sometimes your character will have to make tough decisions based on their values, interests, and goals. Such decisions affect their convictions. This can develop in three directions: Dogmatic, Iconoclast, Heretical. Each includes five ranks — the higher the rank, the more zealously the character follows their convictions, and the more noticeably the world around them reacts to their actions and decisions. Promotion through the ranks of each of the three directions opens up access to new dialogue lines, events, unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and also changes the attitude of others toward your character. Also, some items can only be equipped by characters with certain convictions. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent. Your character's allies have convictions of their own, as well.

traits.locale_text: Manchmal muss dein Charakter schwierige Entscheidungen treffen, die auf seinen Werten, Interessen und Zielen basieren. Solche Entscheidungen beeinflussen die Überzeugungen. Dies kann sich in drei Richtungen entwickeln: Imperialis, Benevolentia, Haereticus. Jede umfasst fünf Ränge – je höher der Rang, desto eifriger folgt der Charakter seinen Überzeugungen und desto deutlicher reagiert die Welt um ihn herum auf seine Handlungen und Entscheidungen. Die Beförderung durch die Ränge jeder der drei Richtungen eröffnet den Zugang zu neuen Dialogoptionen, Ereignissen, einzigartigen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und verändert auch die Haltung der anderen gegenüber deinem Charakter.

languages.text: Votre personnage devra parfois prendre de difficiles décisions en fonction de ses valeurs, de ses intérêts et de ses objectifs. Ces décisions affectent ses convictions. Celles-ci peuvent évoluer dans trois directions : Dogmatique, Iconoclaste ou Hérétique. Chacune comprend cinq rangs. Plus le rang est élevé, plus le personnage suit ses convictions avec ferveur, et plus le monde qui l'entoure réagit à ses actions et à ses décisions. Progresser dans les rangs de chacune des trois directions permet d'accéder à de nouvelles lignes de dialogue, à des événements, à des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} uniques, et modifie également l'attitude des autres envers votre personnage. De plus, certains objets ne peuvent être utilisés que par des personnages dotés de convictions spécifiques. Lorsqu'un personnage atteint le rang III (Disciple) d'une branche de conviction, elle devient son intérêt principal et il ne peut plus dépasser le rang II (Partisan) des deux autres branches de conviction. Les alliés de votre personnage disposent également de leurs propres convictions.
languages.original_text: Sometimes your character will have to make tough decisions based on their values, interests, and goals. Such decisions affect their convictions. This can develop in three directions: Dogmatic, Iconoclast, Heretical. Each includes five ranks — the higher the rank, the more zealously the character follows their convictions, and the more noticeably the world around them reacts to their actions and decisions. Promotion through the ranks of each of the three directions opens up access to new dialogue lines, events, unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and also changes the attitude of others toward your character. Also, some items can only be equipped by characters with certain convictions. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent. Your character's allies have convictions of their own, as well.

traits.locale_text: Votre personnage devra parfois prendre de difficiles décisions en fonction de ses valeurs, de ses intérêts et de ses objectifs. Ces décisions affectent ses сonvictions. Celles-ci peuvent évoluer dans trois directions : Imperialis, Benevolentia et Hereticus. Chacune comprend cinq rangs. Plus le rang est élevé, plus le personnage suit ses convictions avec ferveur, et plus le monde qui l'entoure réagit à ses actions et à ses décisions. Progresser dans les rangs de chacune des trois directions permet d’accéder à de nouvelles lignes de dialogue, à des événements, à des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} uniques, et modifie également l'attitude des autres envers votre personnage.

languages.text: Kimi zaman karakterin; sahip olduğu değerlere, çıkarlarına ve hedeflerine göre zor kararlar vermek zorunda kalacaktır. Bu tarz kararlar onun kanaatini etkiler. Bu kanaatler üç yönde gelişebilir: Dogmatik, Ezber Bozan ve Kâfirce. Her biri beş kademe içerir. Kademe ne kadar yüksekse karakter kanaatlerini o kadar ısrarla savunur ve çevresindeki dünya da eylem ve kararlarına çok daha belirgin bir şekilde tepki verir. Bu üç yönün herhangi birinin kademelerinde yükselmek; yeni diyalog satırlarına, olaylara ve eşsiz {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlere{/g} erişim sağlar. Ayrıca başkalarının karakterine karşı sergiledikleri tutumu değiştirir. Ayrıca bazı eşyalar yalnızca belirli kanaate sahip karakterlerce kuşanılabilir. Kanaat dallarından bir tanesi III. kademe olan Ateşli'ye ulaştığında o kanaat, karakterinin ana odağı hâline gelir. Bu olduğunda diğer iki kanaat dalı, II. kademe olan Taraftar'ın üstüne çıkamaz. Karakterinin yoldaşlarının da kendine ait kanaatları mevcuttur.
languages.original_text: Sometimes your character will have to make tough decisions based on their values, interests, and goals. Such decisions affect their convictions. This can develop in three directions: Dogmatic, Iconoclast, Heretical. Each includes five ranks — the higher the rank, the more zealously the character follows their convictions, and the more noticeably the world around them reacts to their actions and decisions. Promotion through the ranks of each of the three directions opens up access to new dialogue lines, events, unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and also changes the attitude of others toward your character. Also, some items can only be equipped by characters with certain convictions. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent. Your character's allies have convictions of their own, as well.
